text: Planorbidella depressa is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Neomphalidae. ==Description== The shell can grow to be 1.6 mm in length. ==Distribution== Planorbidella depressa can be found in the Lau Basin. ==References== Category:Neomphalidae Category:Gastropods described in 1993
title: Planorbidella depressa
